name: Lulu the Princess Dress
description:
Lulu the Princess Dress 

A beautiful background of orange, pink and purple, this little dress will turn heads. It was an appliqued crown sttiched on. The crown is professionally finished and the edges will not fray. The little jewels are sewn on and then glued to make sure they do not come off, but as with all small things, if this dress is purchased for a small child, please use caution. It is tied with royal purple ties, fit for any princess. The back is ruffled in 6 ruffles to give it sweetness coming and going.

name: Multi Plaid Boy Shorts
description:
Boy's clothing is always hard to find. Cute boy's clothing is even harder. Boy's bottoms that aren't jeans but match everything? Almost impossible to find. If your a cloth diaper parent, you will love these shorts. I made them to fit a fluff butt, which tends to be larger than a diaposable bottom. The cut of these shorts are wider through the hip to allow a better fit for fluff diapers. But don't worry if you use disposable. They fit diaposable bottoms as well. 

These shorts are a patch work mixture of different plaids to match and go with anything in your little man's wardrobe. They are preffionally finished and hemmed and include an elastic waist and pull on style for easy on and off.

name: Ginny The Giraffe Pillowcase Dress
description:
Ginny looks awful sweet setting on this dress just waiting for your little one. This little dress is light pink dotted back ground with giraffe printed ruffled bottom and tie. Ginny is hand drawn, cut out, pieced and appliqued on. Her little horns are made of ribbon and her little tail is crocheted trim. Her eye are sewn on and glued to ensure they do not come off. She will be perfect for your next visit to the zoo, to Bush gardens, a first birthday or just another day looking cute at home.


Pillowcase dresses are a great investment. They can be worn as shown, with a tshirt underneath, and with a long sleeve t. They look great as a dress or a top with leggings and jeans. 

This dress comes in sizes 3m to 2T.

name: Grow With Me Dresses to Skirts Pretty Pastel
description:
Grow with Me Dress to Skirt

When my daughter was younger, I purchase boutique clothing all the time for her. I loved how sweet she looked and how original the clothes were. My problem was they didn't last was long as I would have liked. When I began making her clothing, I wanted something to grow with her and last for a few seasons, could be worn as is for hot summer days and with a T-shirt or long sleeve tee for cooler months. 

The Grow with Me Dresses to Skirts are the answer to this issue. If I'm going to spend the money on Boutique clothing, I want it to last. 

The Dresses are shirred and have tons of stretch. They go from a halter top dress, to a halter top tunic with leggings and finally a skirt where you tie ribbons used for a halter on the side of the skirt in a bow. Three different looks, one great little outfit. 

Dresses will fit a range of sizes so buy now in the size your little girl is and it will stretch to fit the size they need. You will get lots of wear out of this outfit.


The dress up for sale is so sweet. Pretty Pastel colored dress in a retro styled flower print, it is paired with a pastel plaid ruffle. The hatler is tied with a lavender satin ribbon with a three yo-yo detail. It is shown as a skirt on the form.

name: Grow With Me Dresses to Skirts Roses
description:
Grow with Me Dress to Skirt

Up for sale is the rose pattern dress. This dress is ruffled with a large floral print , a smaller flower print in the middle tier and a large rose print on the bottom. The halter is tied with a yellow satin ribbon.

name: Shabby Chic Pillowcase Dress
description:
Such a sweet little dress with sweet details. Toile fabric printed on a powder blue background with mint green, cream and pale pink accents. Double ruffled bottom with a removable rose. The ties are a satin pale pink ribbon with eyelet detail. Such a sweet dress.

Pillowcase dresses are a great investment. They be worn as shown, with a tshirt underneath, and with a long sleeve t. They look great as a dress or a top with leggings and jeans. 

This dress comes in sizes 3m to 7.

name: Tribal Cuteness Pillowcase Dress
description:
I love how this little dress turned out. Made with handmade batik fabric and jersey knit ruffled zebra fabric. This little dress is sure to turn some heads. Because of the nature of handmade batik , no two dresses will be alike. The colors on this are so rich and playful. The neck is tied with a satin bow and the ends are treated to prevent fraying. I only have so much of this fabric, so when it's gone, it's gone.

Pillowcase dresses are a great investment. They be worn as shown, with a tshirt underneath, and with a long sleeve t. They look great as a dress or a top with leggings and jeans. 

This dress comes in sizes 3m to 7.

description:
Grow with Me Dress to Skirt

When my daughter was younger, I purchase boutique clothing all the time for her. I loved how sweet she looked and how original the clothes were. The one up for sale is a black background with multi colored flowers all over and a two tired bottom hem with a contrasting striped fabric in between. It has a rolled rose in the matching striped fabric on the bodice and has teal colors ties. The ties go through button holes in the back and tie in a sweet bow.

name: Classic Bib
description:
When a baby is born, mothers are given three main things:
Clothes
Diapers
Bibs

Bibs are the essential baby accessory. From drooling due to teething to spitting up to learning to eat solid food, babies are messy and moms try and keep their little outfits clean and dry.

Sticky Fingers makes a classic shaped bib that is waterproof. Instead of being hard and stiff, like some waterproof bibs can be, Sticky Fingers bibs are soft and flexible. 

These bibs are made with a cotton patterned front, two (2) layers of absorbant flannel and PUL backing." What is PUL?" you might ask. PUL is the fabric that some cloth diapers are made from. It is a durable cloth fabric on the outside and is lined with a plastic to keep onesise and little outfits nice and dry. 

Bibs are 8.5 inches from the yolk (where the bib tucks up under the chin) and the bottom. They are a nice rounded shape on bottom. Bibs close with a durable plastic snap. These snaps will not rust or tangle your laundry like velcro can.

name: Upcycled Bow Tie
description:
What little man doesn't look dashing in a bow tie? 

We have bow ties from all colors and patterns mades from men ties. The bow ties have a snap in the back for ease of fasening.They are made in sizes and the ties themselves are a little larger than most. These are pre tied bow ties. Please check out our tied bow ties for larger sizes.

name: Car Organizer
description:
Need a place to store your kids stuff without having them reaching all over the car? Tired of trying to strain at stoplights to get that favorite toy? 

My car organizer is a 4 pocket, sturdy, and pretty little organizer. It has deep pockets to allow books and DVDS and also is sturdy enough to stuff it full. The organizer can hang from the back of the front seats or in the middle of two car seats. It is 24 inches long and 21 inches wide (standard car seat) and aloows easy access to grab things. 

I got this idea from a friend who was going to go on a long car trip. She needed something that was easy to use for her two small kids and could fit between the seats so that both brother and sister could reach. The pockets are reinforced and elastic sides to allow easy access. 

You can personalize your car organizer with your family name or your child's name for an extra $3 per organizer.


Happy trails!

name: Ballerina Tutu
description:
Ballerina Tutu

This tutu is perfect for your little girl's dance studio days and can be purchased wholesale for Dance studio's only. These are short and sweet tutus. 

This tutu can be made in an array of colors and up to three colors choices. Tutus are made from over 50 yards of soft tulle that meets CPSIA standards. Each tutu is machine sewn and professionally finished, no knots here. The elastic waist band is unique to Sticky Fingers in that it is hypoallergenic, no latex is used in the elastic band. Each embellishment (flowers, ribbon etc) are adhered to the tutu by stitching first and using a professional adhesive for extra strength. 

Each tutu is made to fit your little one. When you order, you give the size she is currently wearing or a waist measurement and I make the tutu to fit her exactly. The tulle is full and fluffy and 43-6inches long depending on her size.

When checking out, please specify Newborn to 12m or 6y+ as these are different pricing.
